
## Sediment Concentration

```{r sediment-concentration, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
sc1 = read_sc(file1, type1)
sc2 = read_sc(file2, type2)
sc.diff = diff_sc(sc1, sc2)
sc.rmse.station = rmse_sc(sc.diff, "Station")
sc.rmse.time = rmse_sc(sc.diff, "Time")

sc.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_sc) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Sediment Concentration Differences at Stations")
sc.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_sc) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Sediment Concentration RMSE at Stations")
sc.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_sc) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Sediment Concentration RMSE Through Time")
```
